t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    c = 0
    tem = n
    while n != 0:
        r = n % 10
        if r == 4:
            c += 1
        n = n // 10
    print(c)

from collections import Counter
t = int(input())
count = 0
while t > 0:
    str = input()
    letters = Counter(str)
    print(letters['4'])
    t = t - 1
